name: AI Floor Plan Generator
description:
An intelligent tool for creating and optimizing floor plans. Key features include:
- Customizable floor area and units (m, cm, mm).
- Definition of room types with specific dimensions and quantities.
- Placement of fixed 'blocked areas' like corridors or columns.
- Generation of multiple, optimized layouts based on maximizing space and room diversity.
- Interactive 2D and 3D visualization of generated plans.
- Export options to DXF for CAD software and JSON for data archiving.
